item.title: Automating Code Reviews with Amazon CodeGuru
item.description: Lab Automating Code Reviews with Amazon CodeGuru Associating Amazon CodeGuru with a CodeCommit Repository 1. Navigate to the Amazon CodeCommit console. 2. Click java-web-app: 3. Notice that at the moment, only a README file has been committed to the master branch. Next, you’ll associate CodeGuru with this repository, so that CodeGuru can begin to analyze the code therein. 4. Go to the CodeGuru dashboard. 5. Click Associate Repository and run analysis: 6. Select AWS CodeCommit as the provider, choose java-web-app from the repository dropdown, enter _master_into Source branch and click Associate:
